name: School Website
description: A modern and responsive school website designed to showcase academic excellence, facilities, admissions, and connect parents, students, and staff seamlessly.

name: Library Website
description: A clean and user-friendly library website that provides access to books, digital resources, membership details, and promotes a culture of reading and learning.

name: iNoteBook
description: A digital notebook web application designed to securely store, edit, and manage personal notes online with user authentication and cloud-based access.

name: NewsMonkey
description: A real-time news web application that fetches the latest headlines across various categories using APIs, delivering fast and categorized news updates to users.

name: TextUtils
description: A simple and efficient text utility web app that allows users to analyze, modify, and format text with features like word count, case conversion, and extra space removal.

name: B.Tech RTU Notes
description: A dedicated website built for B.Tech students under RTU, offering well-organized, easy-to-access semester-wise notes and study materials for exam preparation.

name: ToDos List
description: A responsive To-Do List web app that helps users add, manage, and delete daily tasks efficiently, enhancing productivity and task tracking.

name: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game built using web technologies, offering an interactive and fun way for two players to compete with a simple and responsive interface.

name: PortFolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and achievements, designed to reflect individuality and professionalism for academic or career opportunities.

name: E-Commerce
description: A dynamic e-commerce website that allows users to browse products, add items to a cart, and place orders—featuring a clean UI and secure shopping experience.

name: Rock-Paper-Scissors-Game
description: An interactive Rock-Paper-Scissors game built with simple logic and animations, allowing users to play against the computer in a fun and engaging way.

name: Task-Management-System
description: A web-based Task Management System designed to create, assign, track, and update tasks efficiently—ideal for improving team productivity and project organization.
